Description:
J B 1 00322/03 = 312346190
You have failed to ensure that the Kemper SmartMaster local exhaust ventilation unit (serial number: 191100278), has been thoroughly examined and tested in the last 14 months by a suitably competent person and a suitable record of the examination and test obtained.

J B 1 00322/02 = 312346170
You have failed to take effective measures to prevent access to dangerous parts of machinery, namely the rotating cutters on your Hure milling machine (machine number A072778002) whilst in operation, giving rise to the risk of injury from entanglement.

J B 1 00322/01 = 312346058
You have failed to take effective measures to prevent access to dangerous parts of machinery, namely the clamping mechanisms on your Edwards Hydrofold (machine number Girling B314677001) metal folding machine whilst in operation, giving rise to the risk of injury from crushing and amputation.
